meanings.definition: A device used for making mathematical calculations.
meanings.sent1: I used the calculator to add up all my expenses.
meanings.sent2: The calculator helped me solve the difficult math problem.
meanings.sent3: The calculator and I are a great team when it comes to numbers.
meanings.sent4: Her mind worked like a calculator, always processing information quickly.
meanings.sent5: The calculator beeped happily when I got the answer right.

meanings.definition: A person who calculates or computes.
meanings.sent1: The accountant is a skilled calculator who handles all the company's finances.
meanings.sent2: My friend is a human calculator and can do math in his head faster than anyone.
meanings.sent3: I jokingly call my math teacher a calculator because she's always right.
meanings.sent4: She's a calculator when it comes to planning parties, always knowing exactly what to do.
meanings.sent5: The calculator in the office never makes mistakes in his calculations.
